title: Social Work B.S.W.  · Angelo State University
description: Complete your B.S.W. degree at ASU 100% online or in person! Our program will prepare you to become a licensed social worker in a variety of career fields.

headings: Do you want to help other people improve their lives?
What Can You Do With a Social Work Degree?
Why Earn My Social Work Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: If you have this type of caring nature and truly want to see others succeed, then a social work major could be your calling. In our program, you’ll gain the knowledge and skills you need to advocate for people of all ages and cultures who have experienced social, mental or physical problems.

Our program can be completed on campus or 100% online, and our B.S.W. online program has been ranked among the best in the U.S. You’ll also be prepared to start your career as soon as you graduate, as you will be eligible to sit for the Texas State Board of Social Work Examiners Licensing Exam.
Contact Information
Our B.S.W. and M.S.W. degrees are accredited by theCouncil on Social Work Education’s Board of Accreditation.

Our faculty are licensed social workers who can speak first-hand about their professional experience. Our small class sizes mean you get the individual attention you deserve, and our faculty are dedicated to delivering the best possible learning experience, whether it’s on campus or online. Our faculty are a primary reason we have one of the fastest-growing social work programs in Texas.
Social Work Faculty and Staff
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.
Our B.S.W. degree has been ranked in the “Best Online Bachelor’s Degrees in Social Work” for 2023 by EduMed.org.

Whether you complete our program on campus or earn our online B.S.W. degree, you’ll enjoy career opportunities in case management, family social work, community development, criminal justice, public health, school social work, social services administration, and many types of counseling.
Plus, the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics reports that employment opportunities for social workers are expected to increase steadily through 2031, adding over 60,000 new jobs.
Explore Career Possibilities

Gain a global perspective of social work as you travel across Europe in our annual summer study abroad program. As you visit the Czech Republic, Romania and the Netherlands, you’ll meet social work students and faculty at our partner universities and work with professionals at social services agencies. There is also plenty of fun to be had on various cultural excursions.

Internships are available at various local agencies and nonprofit organizations through our field education program. Interns take on a case load and work with real clients, so you gain valuable experience and marketable skills before you graduate. This will give you an advantage when applying for a job or for graduate school.

Get connected and stay connected by joining our student organizations. Our Student Social Work Association and Phi Alpha national honor society provide opportunities for professional development, networking, community involvement and social events. Really getting to know your fellow students and professors also adds to a fulfilling college experience.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.
Explore the Honors Advantage

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
